story.book.view

Class StoryFragmentReadActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • story.book.view.StoryFragmentReadActivity

  • public class StoryFragmentReadActivity
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
    StoryFragmentReadActivity is an interface for users to read a story fragment (left tab), as well as an interface for users to add annotations (right tab) on the story fragment which is currently being read.
    Author:
    Jessica Surya
